properties.name: shiro.loginUrl
properties.description: The application's login URL to be assigned to all acquired Filters that subclass AccessControlFilter or 'null' if no value should be assigned globally.

properties.name: shiro.successUrl
properties.description: The application's after-login success URL to be assigned to all acquired Filters that subclass AuthenticationFilter or null if no value should be assigned globally.

properties.name: shiro.unauthorizedUrl
properties.description: The application's 'unauthorized' URL to apply to as a convenience to all discovered AuthorizationFilter instances.

properties.name: shiro.sessionManager.sessionIdCookieEnabled
properties.description: Enable or disable session tracking via a cookie.

properties.name: shiro.sessionManager.sessionIdUrlRewritingEnabled
properties.description: Enable or disable session tracking via a URL parameter.  If your site requires cookies, it is recommended you disable this.

properties.name: shiro.rememberMeManager.cookie.maxAge
properties.description: specify remember me cookie max age(seconds).
